meanings.sent1: She rediscusses the book with her friend.
meanings.sent2: They often rediscuss their favorite movies.
meanings.sent3: The group rediscusses the plan for the picnic.
meanings.sent4: He rediscusses his dreams with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: Rediscussing the rules helps clarify any confusion.

meanings.definition: To have a conversation again about (something)
meanings.sent1: They rediscuss the party details for the third time.
meanings.sent2: She rediscusses the project requirements with her team.
meanings.sent3: The siblings rediscuss who gets the top bunk bed.
meanings.sent4: He rediscusses the budget, hoping for a compromise.
meanings.sent5: Rediscussing the rules of the game leads to fair play.
